channel.title: PC = Nothing
channel.description:
I recently realized that jagex is very mathematically smart. Lets say your training str, and are playing pc with str, your str lvl is 66, so you spend hours in pc thinking you will lvl faster. not.
attacking something outside of pc = 4xp per damage attacking something in pc = 2 xp per damage.
^^so that means if you hit a 20 you get 20 x 4 = xp gained.^^
you get 224 xp per point.
the time it takes to get 22400 xp outside of pc is = to the tine it takes to get 100 pts in pc.
so basicly, pc is no faster. but more fun. the only thing good you can get out of it is void knight robes.

item.title: PC = Nothing

[quote=“Casey., post:6, topic:135816”]I had the mace before all the easy way came out so I’m cool

neither have i… i went to the riot in world 99 the day it came out… wasnt realy a riot basically turned into a spamming session seeing who could spam more…
